short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tasks organiser that saves your tasks for 48 hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you spend a lot of time online, you’ve likely experienced moments where you lose track of the tasks you need to accomplish. While most people use to-do apps or project management tools to stay organized, there are times when minor tasks slip through the cracks or when you have so many browser tabs open that switching to a separate app to manage tasks becomes cumbersome.

For those who primarily work in browsers and need a simple way to stay on top of their tasks, browser extensions are the ideal solution. However, I found that many existing extensions are either too complex or lack the minimalist design I was looking for. That’s why I created this extension.

Originally developed for my own use, I’m sharing it with you because I believe it can enhance your productivity too. Give it a try, and keep an eye out for more extensions coming your way soon.

Enjoy the extension!
